oldentry: Popular explanation: moving the sides of something apart.
verblex: 1. To make something measure more from side to side. English = widen.
2. To measure a large distance from one side to another. English = (be) wide, (be) broad.
nomlex: 1. The measure of the distance from one side of an object to the other, the measure of the narrowness or width of something. English = width.
